metadata.title: CVE-2020-28039 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: is_protected_meta in wp-includes/meta.php in WordPress before 5.5.2 allowsarbitrary file deletion because it does not properly determine whether ameta key is considered protected.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
